title: ETH may reclaim $3.2K soon, based on low stablecoin yields: Santiment
contentSnippet: Stablecoin yields not being overly high suggests the market hasn’t reached a “major top” and Ether may reach $3,200 in the near term, according to Santiment.

title: Nasdaq crypto chief pledges to ‘move as fast as we can’ on tokenized stocks
contentSnippet: Nasdaq’s head of digital assets strategy, Matt Savarese, said the stock exchange is ready to answer any questions the SEC may have for its proposal for tokenized stocks.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: BTC mining difficulty forecast to rise in Dec, as hashprice sits near record lows
contentSnippet: Bitcoin miners caught a break on Thursday as difficulty dropped, but the relief may be short-lived if it rises in December, as forecast.

title: Bitcoin ETFs Are Now BlackRock’s Top Revenue Source, Exec Says
contentSnippet: The firm's US-listed spot bitcoin ETF IBIT, launched in January 2024, reached $70 billion in assets in record time and has generated hundreds of millions in fees.

title: 1.75M Hyperliquid tokens unlocked today, but was the price impacted?
contentSnippet: The Hyperliquid development team provided clarity on Saturday's token unlock in response to community fears of increased selling pressure.

title: Meet the Billion-Dollar Crypto Founder Who Started Trading at 9 Years Old
contentSnippet: Denis Dariotis, the youthful founder and CEO of cryptocurrency-focused trading software firm GoQuant, talks about building a billion-dollar-a-day trading startup during his formative years.

title: Strategy CEO: Equity and Debt Flexibility Power Long-Term Bitcoin Accumulation Plan
contentSnippet: Phong Le says Strategy has no near-term debt maturity risk and plans to continue using convertibles and equity to grow its bitcoin position over time.

title: Crypto self-custody is a fundamental right, says SEC's Hester Peirce
contentSnippet: Self-custody of assets and financial privacy are both fundamental rights consistent with the pro-freedom philosophy on which the US was founded.

title: Crypto Payments Firm Truther to Launch Non-Custodial USDT Visa Card in El Salvador
contentSnippet: The card doesn't require preloading funds or custodial services, and carries a 2% fee on currency conversions, with no IOF tax for Brazilian users.

title: UK Budget Confirms New Crypto Reporting Rules from January 1
contentSnippet: The UK government expects to raise $417 million in extra tax as UK-registered crypto exchanges are required to record customer details.

title: State of Crypto: Kalshi and Prediction Markets Face a Setback
contentSnippet: The court cases will continue for the moment.

title: ‘Privacy Is the Immune System of Freedom’: Crypto Advocacy Sparks Uproar in São Paulo
contentSnippet: An executive at a Brazil-based crypto firm argued that increasing regulation and surveillance are a threat to freedom, and that P2P tech remains a vital line of defense.

title: Why Gold Is Winning Over Bitcoin in 2025: Liquidity, Trade, and Trust
contentSnippet: Despite ETF hype, central banks and asset allocators continue to choose gold over crypto for reserve and trade purposes.

title: DATs bring crypto’s insider trading problem to TradFi: Shane Molidor
contentSnippet: Information asymmetry and front-running behaviors are migrating from token markets to institutional products like DATs, warns Shane Molidor of Forgd.

title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs break four-week outflow streak with $70M in weekly inflows
contentSnippet: Spot Bitcoin ETFs snap a four-week outflow run with $70 million in weekly inflows as Ether ETFs also turn positive and analysts flag a potential Bitcoin bottom.

title: Bitcoin Pricing in 'Most Bearish Global Growth Outlook' Since Covid and FTX Crash: Bitwise Research
contentSnippet: Despite low sentiment and falling prices, Bitwise’s André Dragosch says bitcoin is trading as if a recession is imminent, while macro growth expectations are already improving.

title: Bitcoin forms short-term bottom, $100K relief rally in sight: Analyst
contentSnippet: Bitcoin may be forming a local bottom as RSI nears oversold and whales open longs, fueling a possible relief rally toward the $100,000–$110,000 zone.

title: Why China’s Bitcoin mining activity is surging again after a 4-year crackdown
contentSnippet: Bitcoin mining in China is rising again. From dominance to ban to resurgence, this makes an engaging story.

title: Has XRP Finally Bottomed? Key Support Holds as Wave-5 Breakout Trigger Nears
contentSnippet: A close above $2.22 would confirm a bullish trend, while failure to hold $2.17 could lead to further declines.

title: Bitcoin's 'Coinbase Premium' Flips Positive After Weeks in the Red
contentSnippet: The premium — which tracks the price spread between Coinbase and the global market — acts as a read on U.S. capital flows in previous cycles.

title: OpenAI Confirms Data Breach—Here's Who Is Impacted
contentSnippet: OpenAI said a Mixpanel breach exposed API user metadata—and urged customers to watch for phishing attacks.

title: 'Bad Joke': FC Barcelona Criticized for $22 Million Deal with Samoan Crypto Firm ZKP
contentSnippet: A former FC Barcelona board member hit out at the deal with ZKP on social media, highlighting the firm's “unknown” ownership.

title: Stablecoin Giant Tether to Shutter Uruguay Bitcoin Mining Operation
contentSnippet: USDT stablecoin issuer Tether is halting its Bitcoin mining operations in Uruguay due to high energy costs, local media has reported.

title: BitMine and Bitcoin Miners' Stocks Surge as BTC, Ethereum Recover
contentSnippet: Crypto-related equities like BitMine and leading Bitcoin mining stocks are jumping as Bitcoin and Ethereum regain key levels.

title: Myriad Moves: Predictors Turn Bullish on Bitcoin Rebounding to $100K
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on Bitcoin's next price move, whether Brian Armstrong will appear UpOnly, and more.

title: Monero and Zcash Diverge in Double-Digit Weekly Swing as Privacy Coins Rotate
contentSnippet: Monero surged 23% this week on futures speculation while Zcash fell equally, reflecting leverage and timing within the privacy narrative.

title: Trump White House ‘World’s Most Corrupt Crypto Startup Operation’: House Democrats
contentSnippet: President Trump and his family made $800 million from sales of cryptocurrencies in the first half of the year, according to a new report.

title: South Korean Police Officers Indicted in $186 Million Crypto-Laundering Case
contentSnippet: The two officers have been stripped of their positions following their arrest in connection with the crypto money-laundering scheme.

title: Balancer Outlines Reimbursement Plan Following $128M Exploit
contentSnippet: Balancer has identified six whitehat actors who recovered approximately $3.9 million across multiple networks during the exploit.

title: 中国国家ブロックチェーン構想、6種類のパブリックチェーンを統合へ　イーサリアムやテゾスなどが対象
contentSnippet: 中国の国家ブロックチェーンプラットフォーム「BSN」が、パブリックブロックチェーンを統合することが分かった。イーサリアムやテゾスなど6種類のパブリックチェーンが選ばれた。

title: 米国版バイナンス、仮想通貨COSMOS（ATOM）とネオ（NEO）を新規上場
contentSnippet: 米国版バイナンスに、仮想通貨COSMOS（ATOM）とネオ（NEO）を新規上場。取引ペアはそれぞれ米ドル（USD）建とテザー建（USDT）の計4種類。これで上場した仮想通貨は23銘柄になった。

title: 仮想通貨イーサリアム、NEOを扱うDEX「Switcheo」がOTC取引開始｜低コストでP2P取引可能に
contentSnippet: 今日、分散型取引所「Switcheo」はOTC取引開始予定であることを発表した。

title: 仮想通貨ネオ（NEO）チェーン上で「意図しないフォーク」発覚　一時ブロック数に影響も現在は通常通り
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ネオ（NEO）のブロック数表示が一時停止したほか、仮想通貨取引所Switcheoが「意図しないフォーク」が発生したと報じていた。しかし現在は通常通り、ネオブロックチェーンでブロック生成が行われている。、

title: 英Finderが今年初の仮想通貨相場見通しを発表｜ビットコインやリップル（XRP）は短期下落も長期的には上昇を予想
contentSnippet: 英国の比較サイトFinder.comが1月度の仮想通貨価格予想を公開した。ビットコインやイーサリアム、リップル（XRP）等の主要11銘柄においては2月1日までには大方下落を予想する結果となったものの、年末までには全面的に上昇が予測されている。

title: 2019年の主要アルトコインに控えるファンダメンタル材料は？｜仮想通貨注目イベントまとめ
contentSnippet: 相場は下落基調も、多くの主要アルトコインには注目すべきイベントが2019年に控える。1月に控えるイーサリアム大型イベントや、市場でも注目が集まるライトコインの半減期などをまとめた。

title: イーサリアム以外のスマートコントラクト・プロジェクト
contentSnippet: ブロックチェーンの仕組みであるスマートコンタクトという概念をわかりやすく解説。またイーサリアムブロックチェーン以外で進められているスマートコンタクトを利用するプロジェクトも独自でピックした。

title: 大手3社、仮想通貨レーティング比較：BTC、ETHに続いてNEO、LISK、ADAが高評価に
contentSnippet: 本記事では、大手3社の格付けメディアによって公表されたレーティングを上位時価総額の仮想通貨について比較した。BTC、ETHに続いて、ADA、NEO、LISKの3通貨がいずれの格付けからも高い評価を受けていることがわかった。

title: 老舗格付けサイト「お買い得の仮想通貨」にXRP(リップル)など4銘柄を挙げる
contentSnippet: 格付け会社Weiss Ratingsは、フィボナッチ指標からリップル（XRP）など4銘柄をトップ通貨として推奨。ポテンシャルを持つ通貨として、Stellar、EOS、XRPなど5通貨も名指しした。

title: TRON以外にも入札はあった | BitTorrentの巨額買収からNEOが手を引いた理由とは
contentSnippet: 先のTRONによるBitTorrentの巨額買収は、単独入札でも最高額入札でもなかったことが明らかになった。NEOはなぜBitTorrent買収から手を引いたのか。2017年12月から現在に至る経緯を概説する。
